summary: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.
cast: Maureen O'Hara|Brian Keith|Steve Cochran|Chill Wills|Strother Martin|Will Wright|James O'Hara|Peter O'Crotty|Billy Vaughan|Hank Gobble|Big John Hamilton|Chuck Hayward|Riley Hill|Buck Sharpe|Robert Sheldon
